title: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray 'Tongola'
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
abstract: Reminiscences of the life and times of "Grandpa James"
description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000396; Voices from the Riverlands: Njernda Project; Active; 2005
